entry.title: Sunday: Increasing cloudiness. High 25 except 19 near Lake Erie.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness late this afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 near noon. High 25 except 19 near Lake Erie. Humidex 28. UV index 8 or very high. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Showers. Low plus 5.
entry.summary: A few showers ending near midnight then cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers. Risk of a thunderstorm this evening. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High 8. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers changing to 70 percent chance of showers in the afternoon. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. High 8. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023
